title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.33 - Provisions of technical services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.33 - Provisions of technical services

State Regulations
(a) The following are the specific criteria
which the State Educational Agency has developed and will apply to provide
assistance in formulating proposals and in operating programs to local
educational agencies which are less able to compete for Part C funds due to
small size or lack of financial resources. (b) Special additional assistance-in
substantially greater degree than to other districts-in becoming familiar with
grant priorities and procedures, in planning proposals, and in preparing
applications will be provided by the State Education Department personnel and
by optional education program field representatives to districts unable to
compete due to small size or lack of financial resources and in counties of the

State where few if any proposals have been submitted or funded in the previous
year. (c) The criteria to qualify
for this aid are that such districts must have: EITHER
1975-1976 Enrollment less than 1500 pupils and full valuation
for
1975-76 aid less than $25,000 per pupil; OR
Any enrollment and full valuation less than $20,000 per
pupil; AND
Received no title III or title IV-C grant
previously. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2302.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
